overview:
CEO / Entrepreneur / Advisor

CEO of Albedier [Creative Agency], Passionate Web Developer & Designer love to create new Technologies and Provide Peace all over the world working so hard to make new things to make communication easier for all the companies, foundations, schools, groups, causes and talented individuals and I love helping young people to achieve their goals.

My goals: Is to Improve the technology all over the world and to help young to achieve all their goals and to be successful in their life and projects, as an Entrepreneur i like to do new stuff to create new things to put the world in a better shape and to make life easy for all human begins.
